original_text: And the arches thereof were toward the utter court; and palm trees were upon the posts thereof: and the going up to it had eight steps.
korean_text: 현관이 바깥뜰로 향하였고 그 문 벽 위에도 종려나무를 새겼으며 그 문간으로 올라가는 여덟 층계가 있더라

sentences.original_text: And the arches thereof were toward the utter court
and palm trees were upon the posts thereof
and the going up to it had eight steps
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳으로 올라가는 계단은 여덟 계단이 있었더라
